title: Cost-of-renting: Young, struggling and short of cash
description: We hear from young people finding it hard to afford their rent, as well as a landlord facing rising costs.

title: Edinburgh Fringe: The viral comedy stars leaping from TikTok to the stage
description: Comics who have found viral fame talk about making the leap into real-life performance at Edinburgh.

title: Robot boat maps Pacific underwater volcano
description: Uncrewed surface vessel Maxlimer surveys the underwater Hunga-Tonga seamount that erupted in January.

title: Afghanistan: Peace at a price in the Taliban’s heartlands
description: In the Taliban strongholds of southern Afghanistan, there's peace but not without problems.

title: Chandrashekhar Harbola: They waited 38 years for him - then his body came from Siachen
description: Chandrashekhar Harbola went missing in 1984 in the Siachen glacier and his body was found last week.

title: Climate change forces indigenous islanders in Panama to relocate
description: Magdalena Martínez tells the BBC how she feels about leaving the island she grew up on.

title: Partition: Remembering the painful journey from Pakistan to India
description: A 79-year-old who moved from Lahore to Jalandhar in 1947 recalls the long, painful journey.

title: Week in pictures: 13 - 19 August 2022
description: A selection of powerful images from all over the globe, taken in the past seven days.

title: Freya the walrus: Did she have to be euthanised?
description: After becoming a tourist attraction in Oslo, a travelling walrus was killed. Was that right?

title: Ukraine's Crimean fightback having 'psychological impact' on Russia
description: Western officials reveal the impact of recent Ukrainian strikes on the Russian-occupied peninsula.
